item.title: Belgian parliamentarians Twitter accounts
item.description: Now that we can scrape the names of the parliamentarians of the 54th legislature, we can try to find their Twitter accounts too. Let’s start by reconstructing the list. Then we can search Twitter for their Twitter accounts. A bit of grunt work and no nice visuals in this post, but it is needed to harvest parlaimentarians’ tweets soonish.
